attributes.action: step down and call an immediate General Election, due to the consistent failings of himself and this government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current government has consistently failed to meet the expectations of the public, which it serves.  

Fuel Duty, 10p Tax Rates, Immigration and Housing are all areas with problems, to highlight a minute selection of the failings of this government, of which the number is growing rapidly.

This petition calls for the resignation of Gordon Brown, as Prime Minister, and the calling of an immediate General Election.  The people of Britain are not happy, and we want change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
